Hi I'm trying to modify the APA.XSL for Word for citations and bibliography and need some support.

What i did so far is that i modified the citations area in this way (line 4849 ff.):

...
<!-- CUSTOM BEGIN --> <xsl:call-template name="templ_prop_ListSeparator"/>
<xsl:call-template name="templ_prop_NonBreakingSpace"/>
<!-- INSERT HERE --> <xsl:if test="string-length($year) > 0">
<xsl:call-template name="templ_prop_NonBreakingSpace"/>
<xsl:call-template name="templ_prop_OpenBracket"/>
<xsl:value-of select="$year"/>
<xsl:call-template name="templ_prop_CloseBracket"/>
</xsl:if>
<!-- CUSTOM END --> ...

The result is, for citations:
Jobs, (2014), S. 5-22
Apple Inc., (2014), S. 5-22

The result is, what ist fine, for bibliography:
Jobs, S. (2014). My Life at Apple. Cupertino: Apple Publishing.
Apple Inc. (2014). My Life at Apple. Cupertino: Apple Publishing.

What i try but what i do not getting work, is, for citations:
Jobs, S. (2014), S. 5-22
Apple Inc. (2014), S. 5-22

Is there anybody out there who can give me a clue:
(a) how to insert the first capital of the authors first name like it's in the bibliography, i can't find it?
(b) how to avoid the "," when to autor is an organization?

Thanks!
